## Data Analysis

```{r}
params<-parametra%>%
  group_by(Pathogen, Parameter)%>%
  summarise(n = n())

matrix<-tidyr::pivot_wider(data=params[!is.na(params$n),],
                           id_cols=Parameter,
                           names_from=Pathogen,
                           values_from=n)
  
#matrix row names
rnames<-matrix$Parameter
matrix$Parameter<-NULL
matrix<-as.matrix(matrix)
row.names(matrix)<-rnames

matrix[is.na(matrix)]<-0

heatmap(matrix)  
```
